articles.content: Veteran Sri Lankan cricketer Mahela Jayawardene who has been vocal about the current state of his debt-ridden country took to social media recently to respond to a Twitter troll who questioned the Mu… [+2628 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Stoinis screams at umpire after getting bowled, could land in trouble - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The reason for Marcus Stoinis' outburst was on-field umpire Chris Gaffaney's decision not to call Josh Hazlewood's previous delivery wide.
articles.content: It would be an understatement to say Marcus Stoinis was disappointed after dragging a Josh Hazlewood delivery back onto his stumps in an IPL 2022 match against Royal Challengers Bangalore at the DY P… [+1998 chars]

articles.title: 'Bhaiya chai samosa, kuch lau?': Suryakumar Yadav recalls Rishabh Pant's wicket-keeping antics in England - Times Now
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav, in a chat with Guarav Kapur on Breakfast with Champions, spoke of a hilarious incident involving Rishabh Pant. Into the Indian team as a substitute fielder for Cheteshwar Pujara against England, Suryakumar was greeted with some hilarious jok…
articles.content: Shahid Kapoor reveals director was 'worried' that Pankaj Kapur will steal the show in Jersey, said, 'nobody will look at you
